title: The goal of this Flight Management System or module is to fa…
caption_en: The goal of this Flight Management System or module is to familiarise the crew with : - system initialization - copy flight plan route - flight plan construction - flight modification

title: The has one Universal Navigation Corporation UNS 1C installe…
caption_en: The has one Universal Navigation Corporation UNS 1C installed.

title: The is a fully integrated navigation management system desig…
caption_en: The is a fully integrated navigation management system designed to provide the pilot with centralised control for: - airplanes navigation receivers - computer flight planning - fuel management - roll channel input to the autopilot

title: The utilises its associated combined receiver to process sig…
caption_en: The utilises its associated combined receiver to process signals from the nearest four satellites to determine the airplanes precise position.

title: This position is known as Best Computed Position and display…
caption_en: This position is known as Best Computed Position and displayed on the as POS. Typical accuracy of the POS is 25 meters horizontally and 35 meters vertically.

title: In the event of insufficient satellites coverage, the positi…
caption_en: In the event of insufficient satellites coverage, the position can also be derived mathematically from all available navigational receivers such as the VOR and DME receivers.

title: The consists of the following components: - Control Display …
caption_en: The consists of the following components: - Control Display Unit (CDU) - Data Transfer Unit (DTU)
